name: src/addScrollMessToResTable/index.js
init
description:
Add a message when the table in .table-responsive is scrollable.
Add bse-resTableMess attribute to div.table-responsive and run bse.addScrollMessToResTable.init();

params.name: displayMessage
params.description:
Message that you want to display, default value is:
Scroll table horizontally to see more.

name: src/fixModalShifting/index.js
init
description:
Fix bootstrap modal's shifting issue.
Run bse.fixModalShifting.init();

name: src/index.js
content:
import * as utilities from './utilities/index';
import * as addScrollMessToResTable from './addScrollMessToResTable/index';
import * as fixModalShifting from './fixModalShifting/index';
import * as toggleCollapseChevron from './toggleCollapseChevron/index';
import * as scrollToTop from './scrollToTop/index';
import * as resList from './resList/index';

/**
 * utilities
 */
const bse = {
  utilities,
  addScrollMessToResTable,
  fixModalShifting,
  toggleCollapseChevron,
  scrollToTop,
  resList,
};

/**
 * This is the main object that contains all methods
 * @type {Object}
 * @property {Object} bse.utilities
 * Utilityies related to bootstrap
 * @property {function(sel: Object, strClass: string)} bse.utilities.prependClass
 * Add class names to the left most position to avoid overwriting original class's style
 * @property {function():Promise<Object, MyError>} bse.utilities.getJquery
 * Must use this way to get jQuery if we want to attach something to bootstrap's event.
 * @property {function():boolean} bse.utilities.hasScrollBar
 * Check if the current page has scroll bar.
 * @property {function():number} bse.utilities.getScrollBarWidth
 * Get scroll bar's width.
 * @property {function(css: string)} bse.utilities.addStyles
 * Add some css styles to the top most position in head tag.
 * @property {Object} bse.utilities.checkBreakPoint
 * @property {function():string} bse.utilities.checkBreakPoint.checkSize
 * Get window width's info in bootstrap 4's grid system standards.
 * @property {function():boolean} bse.utilities.checkBreakPoint.is
 * Check which grid level is window in.
 * @property {function(keyValue: string, element: Object):Promise<Object, MyError>} bse.utilities.addToWindow
 * Attach object to window without overwriting anything else.
 *
 * @property {Object} bse.addScrollMessToResTable
 * Add a message when the table in .table-responsive is scrollable.
 * @property {function(displayMessage: string)} bse.addScrollMessToResTable.init
 * Init addScrollMessToResTable
 * @property {function(displayMessage: string)} bse.addScrollMessToResTable.update
 * Update addScrollMessToResTable
 *
 * @property {Object} bse.fixModalShifting
 * Fix bootstrap modal's shifting issue.
 * @property {function()} bse.fixModalShifting.init
 * Init fixModalShifting
 *
 * @property {Object} bse.toggleCollapseChevron
 * Automatically toggle bootstrap collapse's chevron based on show or hide collapse.
 * @property {function()} bse.toggleCollapseChevron.init
 * Init toggleCollapseChevron
 *
 * @property {Object} bse.scrollToTop
 * Add scroll to top anchor on the right bottom of the whole page.
 * @property {function(innerElement: string)} bse.scrollToTop.init
 * Init scrollToTop
 *
 * @property {Object} bse.resList
 * Convert a ul li menu to a select options element and display it on small device
 * @property {function(config: Object)} bse.resList.init
 * Init resList
 */
export default bse;

utilities.addToWindow('bse', bse);

name: src/resList/index.js
init
description:
Convert a ul li menu to a select options element and display it on small device
Add bse-resList attribute to ul and run bse.resList.init();
examples:
• PASSENGER
  • TRUCK
  • EARTHMOVER
  • AGRICULTURE
  • AVIATION
  • 2R
bse.resList.init();

params.name: config.className
params.description: calss name that you want to add to select

name: src/scrollToTop/index.js
init
description: Add scroll to top anchor on the right bottom of the whole page.
examples: bse.scrollToTop.init(` `);

params.name: innerElement
params.description: Dom element string that you want to add to that anchor.

name: src/toggleCollapseChevron/index.js
init
description:
Automatically toggle bootstrap collapse's chevron based on show or hide collapse.
Add bse-toggleCollapChevron attribute to chevron link and run bse.toggleCollapseChevron.init();
examples: bse.toggleCollapseChevron.init();

name: src/utilities/addStyles.js
addStyles
description: Add some css styles to the top most position in head tag.

params.name: css
params.description: Css styles that you want to add.

name: src/utilities/addToWindow.js
addToWindow
description: Attach object to window without overwriting anything else.

params.name: keyValue
params.description: Keyword that you want use to get the object from window.

params.name: element
params.description: Dom element that you want to add to window.

name: src/utilities/checkBreakPoint/checkSize.js
checkIfBlock
description: Checks if the span is set to display lock via CSS

name: checkSize
description: Get window width's info in bootstrap 4's grid system standards.

name: src/utilities/checkBreakPoint/index.js
src/utilities/checkBreakPoint/is.js
isAnExpression
description: Determines whether passed string is a parsable expression

name: isAnyActive
description: Returns true if currently active breakpoint matches the expression

name: splitExpression
description: Splits the expression in into <|> [=] alias

name: isMatchingExpression
description: Determines whether current breakpoint matches the expression given

name: is
description: Check which grid level is window in.

return.description: True when window is in the scope. False when window is not in the scope.

name: src/utilities/getJquery.js
getJquery
description:
Get jQuery from window.
Must use this way to get jQuery if we want to attach something to bootstrap's event.

name: src/utilities/getScrollBarWidth.js

return.description:
Page's scroll bar width even if there is no scroll bar.
Return 0 if scroll bar is transparent(Eg: Safari on iPhone/iPad).

name: src/utilities/hasScrollBar.js
hasScrollBar
description: Check if the current page has scroll bar.

return.description:
True if current page has scroll bar.
False if doesn't have scroll bar or scroll bar is transparent(Eg: Safari on iPhone/iPad).

name: src/utilities/index.js
src/utilities/prependClass.js
prependClass
description: Add class names to the left most position to avoid overwriting original class's style

params.name: sel
params.description: Dom element that you want to add class to.

params.name: strClass
params.description: Class name that you want add.
